{"id":677535892,"lang":"swift","time":"2 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1649581833,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"132 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/677535892/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Triangular Sum of an Array","memory":"14.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    func triangularSum(_ nums: [Int]) -> Int {\n        var outputRow = nums\n        \n        while outputRow.count > 1 {\n            var currentRow: [Int] = []\n            \n            for index in 0..<outputRow.count-1 {\n                let currentValue = outputRow[index] + outputRow[index+1]\n                currentRow.append(currentValue % 10)\n            }\n            \n            outputRow = currentRow\n        }\n        \n        return outputRow[0]\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-triangular-sum-of-an-array"}
